name: Save Rotator
description: Set a few saves to be rotated in and out on an interval or by a voted command.
author: x

saves.description: Comma-separated list of saves to read from `data/Saved/Builds` that will be used in rotation. If empty, uses all available saves.

rotate-on-interval.description: Rotate the map every X seconds. If set to zero, interval-based rotation will not occur.

wait-after-clearing.description: Wait X seconds after clearing before loading. For smooth minigame integration, set this to 5-10 seconds, add water, and enable water damage to ensure everyone respawns in time for the next map.

enable-vote-rocking.description: Enable !rtv to initiate the rotation process.

percentage-rtv-to-rotate.description: A number, from 0 to 1, representing the percentage of people in the server required to !rtv to initiate the rotation process.

enable-map-voting.description: If enabled, players will be able to vote between N different maps when the rotation process begins, where N is `map-candidate-count`.

enable-map-nominations.description: If it and `enable-map-voting` are enabled, players will be able to nominate saves to be included in the rotation voting selection.

map-candidate-count.description: The number of maps that can appear in the map voting process.

voting-time.description: Number of seconds that voting should run, provided `enable-map-voting` is true.

commands.name: !rtv
commands.description: Rock the vote. Vote to switch the map.

commands.name: !nominate
commands.description: Nominate a map to be included in the selection process.

args.name: map
args.description: The name of the map to nominate. Must be its save name, minus the `.brs`.

commands.name: !vote
commands.description: Vote for a map during the selection process.

args.name: index
args.description: A number representing the one shown next to the maps listed in the selection process.

commands.name: !maps
commands.description: Shows a list of valid maps for the user to nominate.
